site_name: THE C A R E FOUNDATION

citations.desc: ACCESS AND INSPECTION OF RECORDS AND PROPERTY; SUBMISSION OF ITINERARIES.
citations.narrative:
A responsible adult was not available to accompany APHIS Officials during the inspection process at 11:45 A.M. on
26-JAN-17.
At 11:53 A.M., the licensee called back and indicated that she was at the veterinarian and would not return for
several hours.
Additional Inspectors
Adams Megan, Animal Care Inspector
